# app-builder-cli

> This readme is automatically generated by [create-ink-app](https://github.com/vadimdemedes/create-ink-app)


## Install

```bash
$ npm install --global app-builder-cli
```


## CLI

```
$ app-builder-cli --help

  Usage
    $ app-builder-cli

  Options
    --name  Your name

  Examples
    $ app-builder-cli --name=Jane
    Hello, Jane
```
